name: Rules of My Shop

quests.name: About My Shop
quests.description:
Excellent, welcome to my shop, Traveler. I've got wares from all over, including what Kow says is your old world. 
    This stuff doesn't come cheap, however. Kow and I have to do a lot of magic rituals to get this stuff to work in your dimension.
    The good news? Not only can you earn money by following Kow's instructions, but I'll also buy many things from you!

tasks.longDescription:
For now, bring me a "Pile of Dubloons". This is the standard payment for items, and you can craft it by combining 5 Single Dubloons together.
    Bring me one Pile, and I'll give you a gift for super cheap, deal?

description: Before you peruse my wares, you might want to see what my shop is all about?
